direction.raw_text: Cont.].

direction.raw_text: We see Moocher, Cyril and Mike. All of them are panicking. They seem to be pushing each other forward. Nobody wants to be the one to get on the bike. Into this panic Dave roars in with his bike. He slams on the brakes. Jumps off. His left leg gives way and he falls. Moocher and Cyril run to help him up. Mike is left holding the bike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, Mike! Mike is frozen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got a lead, dammit. Get going. But the crowd, the other riders staring at him, the pressure of the moment is too much for Mike. He just stands there. The lead that they had is evaporating. The other riders are catching up. They are coming around the curve. Moocher runs up to Mike, pushes him away and gets on the bike. His intentions are great, but his legs are short. He can't sit in the saddle and reach the pedals. So he stands and rides just as the other teams come around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rod is smiling.toward Dave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's standing up and going for all he's got. But the other teams are pulling away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BLASE'S CAR 169 He's driving at full speed and listening to the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (o.s.; on radio) It's Sigma Nu, Phi Kappa Psi, Sigma Alpha Epsilon...the Cutters are fading, but it was some try. Dave Blase seems to be hurt. The first aid team has reached him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "BAMBINO" - 8/12/78 91 X EXT.-MR. BLASE'S HOUSE 170 Mr. Blase drives past the house. He slows down as if wondering whether to pick up his wife but then he speeds up again.

direction.raw_text: =ZE 500 STADIUM 170-A Mr. Blase is entering the stadium through a turnstile. Mrs. Blase is standing not far away looking at-him. He doesn't see her right away. As he turns: They look at each other. He is surprised to see her there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BLASE Ev...He sure tried. Even the announcer said so. He is genuinely proud.

direction.raw_text: . BLASE Too bad he... He interrupts..

direction.raw_text: . BLASE Too bad. nothing.

direction.raw_text: The lead r iders pass. Lagging behind them Moocher comes in for an exchange. Cyril takes the bike. His legs are so long his knees just about hit his chin but he takes off in pursuit. Moocher is exhausted. Mike looks on. ' i12Vl Kole) : 134; Where's. Dave. Mike points across the track. Dave is-in the center of the field applying medication from a first-aid station. It's all over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bent over his bike like some human stork he's doing the best he can. He goes past Pit Area 34. Cont.

direction.raw_text: Some of the people in the crowd laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dave is with Mike and Moocher now. He's got adhesive tape in his hands and-is contemplating bandaging up his leg. Rod rides past them in the lead. Mike looks at him. Rod looks at Mike. Cont.

direction.raw_text: - "THE BAMBINO" 6/16/78 92 X 171 Cont.

direction.raw_text: Three black guys are planning strategy. They see Rod getting off the bike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like they're going to save Rod for the sprint. You get on when he does. Stay behind him until the last turn...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moocher is exhausted. Dave is depressed as hell. He"s got adhesive tape in his hand but he doesn't feel like putting it on his. Leg. The-race seems lost. Cyril-comes in for an exchange.- Mike is the only one who can take the bike. He grabs it. Hesitates. Jumps on. Cyril collapses near Dave. Cyril seems quite happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're doing better than I thought we would.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Re's riding like a bull. He goes too hard and drifts out in the turns. He almost runs into pit ONE where Rod is resting and watching him. He gets back in the groove.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moocher and Cyril are sitting together looking quite satisfied. Dave looks at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's standing on the infield and waving his cap at Mike as he goes by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, you cutter!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "BAMBINO" - 6/16/78 93 X DAVE'S P.O.V. - PIT AREA 34 172 -A He, sees his parents on the infield opposite their pit-area. They are waving to him, proud of what he's done. -Nancy has come into the pit area and is, congratulating them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never seen anyone try so hard. I'm so proud of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We showed them, huh? Dave Jumps up. His frustration almost makes biSm look angry.

direction.raw_text: Anybody can tryl

direction.raw_text: is P.O.V. He sees Dave waving to him to come in. Mike looks nearly spent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dave is waving at Mike to come in. Mike is coming in too fast but manages to break. He is totally spent as he gets off the bike. Dave gets on the bike. Moocher runs up and holds Dave in place. Cyril starts putting the adhesive tape around his feet, taping them to the pedal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's like Charlton Heston in.El Cid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're going to lap us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The black riders look up astonished.. Dave rides past their pit.

direction.raw_text: Rod sees Dave go past him. The rider for his team is not far behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'monl C'monl You got him!

direction.raw_text: - "BAMBINO" - 6/16/78 93-A ANGLE ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE TRACK 174 Mr. Blase and Mrs. Blase are standing on the track. Both look stunned to see him back on the bike. X MRS. BLASE Go, son, go damn youl Mr. Blase looks at her surprised by her outburst. Dave X rides past them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moocher, Cyril and Mike are jumping up and down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nets coming around. He is gaining and making up lost ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They, too are shouting something, but Dave no longer hears -hem. The Italian music is playing through his head. It's irresistable and he gives himself over to it for one last time. He no longer hears the crowd shouting, nor anything else except the music, and music seems to be carrying him forward. His face registers the emotion of hearing it...of giving himself over to it...and of a kind of farewell to'it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three black riders look at each other.. They need a new plan, they seem to be thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rod and his teammates are watching Dave's progress. They shake their heads. He can't possibly catch up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It shows 5 laps to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now all three riders are looking back over their shoulders. They see Dave coming on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rod is getting ready to take an exchange for his final sprint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see the black sprinter in Pit area 4 getting ready to take an exchange too. He and Rod look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rod and. the black sprinter get their bikes at the same time and start to accelerate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He passes the third rider from the lead group. Ahead of him he sees Rod and the black rider.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It shows one lap to go. A man is waving a flag signaling the last lap. Rod and the black guy go past him. Dave is behind them and gaining.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.

direction.raw_text: Rod and the black rider are riding abreast now.

direction.raw_text: He sees them right in front of him. The Italian music is still playing as he catches up to them and pulls up behind Rod who's riding on the inside. They are going around the curve. Rod drifts out a bit and that's all the room that Dave needs. He takes the inside edge as they come around for the final stretch. All three of them stand up and begin their final sprint. It looks dead even as they're approaching the finish line. A man is waving the checkered flag. Then, with about forty yards to go, Dave suddenly explodes ahead and wins by an inch or so. He raises his arms in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cyril, Moocher and Mike are running toward Dave. They are Jubilant. They jump on Dave knocking him down. Mike's' brother runs up and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a look of family pride as they embrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nancy runs up to Moocher. She's still wearing her waitress uniform. She practically lifts him off the ground. Dave's parents rush past them. Everybody is shouting. The crowd is cheering. Confetti is falling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's happy but he feels left out. Everybody is hugging and 'getting hugged except for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Katherine is watching the celebration. She looks at Dave and then she looks at Rod not far away. Then she turns slowly and leaves-bidding a farewell, in a way, to a portion of her life. Cont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "BAMBINO" -6/16/78 96 X 177 Cont.1

direction.raw_text: Dave and his parents are walking off. Mike and his brother are arm in arm. Moocher and Nancy are holding hands and going their way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's-holding the four trophies they won. He is trying to swagger but he doesn't know where to go. The guys seem to be going-in separate directions and he doesn't know whom to follow. The CAMERA PULLS BACK FROM him. Confetti is falling everywhere. Wind is blowing it around the stadium.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The branches are swaying in the wind. Leaves are golden yellow and falling off, swirling through the air, falling on the road. Mike's car goes through.the leaves as he drives up an entrance ramp onto a throughway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's wearing.a cowboy hat. Cigarette is in his. mouth. He looks back at a sign: "YOU ARE NOW LEAVING BLOOMINGTON." He lights his cigarette. A highway stretches in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BLASE' S CAR LOT - DAY It's been retitled "CUTTER CARS LTD." Mrs. Blase, quite pregnant now, is sweeping the leaves. Mr. Blase is getting on the bike ready to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: he leaves are falling off here too and blowing in the wind. Students are going to and from classes. We see Dave among them pushing his bike along. He's wearing a Phi Kappa Psi jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks quite collegiate and he seems to know it. But it's fall and fall makes you think of other days and Dave seems to be doing just that. A GIRL walks up to him. She seems quite lost. She speaks with a definite French accent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pardon...do you know where is the office of the Pursar. Dave looks at her. Some of his collegiate exterior fades as he smiles at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cont.

direction.raw_text: - "BAI4BINO" - 6/16/78 96-A 179 Cont.: He's struck. French music begins to play.

direction.raw_text: You're...eh...you're French, eh?
